casebody.data:
LARKIN
v.
LARKIN. No. 452A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 29, 2004. John M. Martin, Greenville, Cindi M. Quay, New Bern, for Mary Jo Tatum Larkin. *694Dallas Clark, Jr., Greenville, for Ernest Larkin.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of November 2004 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Ernest Larkin) shall have up to and including the 20th day of December 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of November 2004."
